name: Cataclysmal
description:
The cats are at it again, dropping delicious farm to table fruit and vegetables in the fish tank! The produce dropped in the tank will engorge itself on the rich nutrients of the aquiramin and grow over 8 times its original size, squeezing everyone out of the aquarium for good! It is up to you Darby the carb to save the entire aquarium. 

Lets go Darby!

Controls::

WASD

Mouse Look
